results.title: [Aquarius: Peter Hall - Director etc.]
results.brief_description: In this film about Peter Hall, his work and life are relayed — by the man himself. This profile of the theatre and film director was conducted on the eve of taking over as director of London’s Royal Opera House.
results.description: In this film about Peter Hall, his work and life are relayed — by the man himself. This profile of the theatre and film director was conducted on the eve of taking over as director of London’s Royal Opera House.
description_for_label: In this film about Peter Hall, his work and life are relayed — by the man himself. This profile of the theatre and film director was conducted on the eve of taking over as director of London’s Royal Opera House.

results.title: [Animated orchestral cartoon by Walter Lantz]
results.brief_description: An animated musical which captures the festive antics of a group of farmyard animals playing a musical symphony using farm objects as instruments. The music gradually builds to a frenzied peak as birds and animals interfere with the conductor’s baton.
results.description: An animated musical which captures the festive antics of a group of farmyard animals playing a musical symphony using farm objects as instruments. The music gradually builds to a frenzied peak as birds and animals interfere with the conductor’s baton.

results.title: [Anatomy of the hand] (D)
results.brief_description: Dissection of a human hand and arm showing the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of the hand and its individual fingers. Presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.
